name: ZRoll
summary: In ZRoll you will encounter many difficult levels. You will need to jump over the platforms, use different mechanisms and collect ancient totems to earn achievements and pass the levels.

name: Z Runaway
summary: A simple and fun arcade. Get on the mad speed in the van, get the money on the road! And try not to break up and lose everything you've been able to gain from your long life at the warm, sunny shore of the sea.

name: ZRun
summary: Fight, dodge, slide and jump your way through the infected city packed with viscous flesh-eating zombies as you attempt to escape with at least a few of your limbs still attached.

name: Z-Race
summary: Experience a new generation of racing in Z-Race, the high-octane VR arcade racer, bursting with sleek futuristic locales, high-speed zero-g gameplay, and an intense, vibrant soundtrack to really get the heart pumping! Challenge anyone and upgrade your racing ship to rocket up the global leaderboard.

name: Z-Rush Survival
summary: Survive in your Virtual Reality (VR) space in this Horror-Thriller based shooting Game. Stay alive by shooting down Zombies that surround you at 360 degree angle.

name: Zruce Adventures
summary: A brand new 3D platformer set in a fantasy world where an evil entity wants to destroy all life in the planet and make a new mechanized one. Solve puzzles, collect stuff and visit different places in North Island as Zruce to defeat this evil being before it's too late.

name: Zra Stories
summary: Zra Stories is a story-driven exploration game that combines adventure with crime story elements. Play a young nature caretaker â€“ a sorceress who has the ability to control natural phenomena. Upon arrival at the island of Zra, a routine order turns into a full-fledged investigation.

name: Z Rush
summary: Z Rush is an exciting strategic 3D game where your task is to place zombies in such a way that they can destroy all the turrets on the level.

name: Zrust
summary: Will you be the greatest space pirate? Build your ship, plunder enemies, and conquer the galaxy in Zrust!
